prelude_controls_battle_attacking.name: prelude_controls_battle_attacking
prelude_controls_battle_attacking.text: Issue an attack order to selected units by right-clicking an enemy.

prelude_controls_battle_camera.name: prelude_controls_battle_camera
prelude_controls_battle_camera.text: Move with the W, A, S and D keys.

prelude_controls_battle_camera_altitude.name: prelude_controls_battle_camera_altitude
prelude_controls_battle_camera_altitude.text: Change height by scrolling the middle mouse-button.

prelude_controls_battle_camera_facing.name: prelude_controls_battle_camera_facing
prelude_controls_battle_camera_facing.text: Drag the middle mouse-button to change facing.

prelude_controls_battle_drag_out_formati.name: prelude_controls_battle_drag_out_formation
prelude_controls_battle_drag_out_formati.text: Right-click and drag on the terrain to order selected units into precise positions.

prelude_controls_battle_halt.name: prelude_controls_battle_halt
prelude_controls_battle_halt.text: Press Backspace to halt selected units.

prelude_controls_battle_multiple_selecti.name: prelude_controls_battle_multiple_selection
prelude_controls_battle_multiple_selecti.text: Select multiple units by left-clicking and dragging a box around them.

prelude_controls_battle_unit_destination.name: prelude_controls_battle_unit_destinations
prelude_controls_battle_unit_destination.text: Hold the spacebar to see unit destinations when moving.

prelude_controls_battle_unit_movement.name: prelude_controls_battle_unit_movement
prelude_controls_battle_unit_movement.text: Issue a move order to selected units by right-clicking on the terrain.

show_tour.name: show_tour
show_tour.text: Click here for a guided tour on Battle Deployment
